title: AI-Integrated Continuing Pharmacy Education Design: Survey-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical knowledge and general understanding of educational methodologies
context.additional_context: A practice-centered course focusing on ethical AI application and policy development in pharmaceutical education.

learning_goals: Learners can generate pharmaceutical education content (assessment items, learning objectives, etc.) using AI tools.
Learners can explain at least three ethical considerations (copyright, information verification, etc.) when establishing AI policies.
Learners can analyze survey data to visualize the current status of AI application in pharmaceutical education settings.

resources: Access to AI-powered content generation tools (ChatGPT, etc.)
Usage rights for survey platforms (Google Forms, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
